short_summary: Request for Proposal (RFP) - Integrated nutrition system for the Queen Elizabeth Hospital and Prince County Hospital
description: The proposal aims to supply an integrated menu system to enhance patient satisfaction and dining experience. The current menu system is manual, and an automated system is desired.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Reference: PEIG-13356

The Government of Prince Edward Island, Health PEI is soliciting proposals for an Integrated Menu System for the Nutrition Services Departments at the Queen Elizabeth Hospital (QEH) and Prince County Hospital (PCH).

#### Tender Overview
The proposed solution should provide an integrated Menu System that enhances patient satisfaction and dining experience. The current manual process requires automation to streamline clinical diet office and food service operations interfaced with Cerner.

**Key Tender Information:**

*   **Tender Closing Date:** Tuesday, March 6, 2023 at 09:00 hrs
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open bidding

#### Evaluation Criteria and Conditions
To be considered, proponents must submit their proposals through the Bonfire Portal: https://healthpei.bonfirehub.ca/opportunities/61484. Please note that only digital submissions will be accepted; HPEI will not accept hardcopy proposals, facsimiles, emails, or any other means of submission. Proponents must complete questionnaires as well as upload files as requested through the Bonfire portal.

**Contact Information:**

Ryan Neumeyer
Project Manager
Health PEI
Email: [rgneumeyer@ihis.org](mailto:rgneumeyer@ihis.org)
Phone: 902-213-9353
Region: Prince Edward Island

**Bid Submission and Evaluation**
Submissions will be evaluated based on the requirements outlined in the tender. The chosen partner will be expected to provide an Integrated Menu System that meets the needs of the hospitals and enhances patient satisfaction.

**Language and Address of Tendering Authority**

The language of the tender is English. Any correspondence or request for clarification or additional information must be submitted through the Bonfire portal.

Please access the complete tender details through the link: https://tenders.princeedwardisland.ca
